snippet: The BMC team, including the American rider Tejay Van Garderen, had a time of 8 minutes 10 seconds to win the opening stage of the Vuelta a España.
abstract: BMC team wins opening stage of Vuelta a Espana bicycle race; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: The BMC team, including the American rider Tejay Van Garderen, had a time of 8 minutes 10 seconds to win the opening stage of the Vuelta a España.

headline.main: BMC Takes First Leg in Spain
headline.print_headline: BMC Takes First Leg in Spain
